useExportType.description:
Description

Promotes the use ofexport typefor types.
TypeScriptallows adding thetypekeyword on anexportto indicate that theexportdoesnâ€™t exist at runtime.
This allows compilers to safely drop exports of types without looking for their definition.
The rule ensures that types are exported using a type-onlyexport.
It also groups inline type exports into a groupedexport type.
useExportType.option: This rule has no specific options.
